select t.blogId blogId, t.title title, count(t.id2) viewNums, t.url cover from ( select t1.blogId,t1.title,t2.blogid id2,t2.ip,t2.time,t3.url from blog t1 left join blog_view t2 on t1.id = t2.blogid left join sys_file t3 on t1.cover = t3.id where t1.enable = "1" and t1.type <> "2"
group by t2.ip,day(t2.time) ) t group by t.blogid order by viewNums desc

select t9.*, count(t10.id) commentNums from( select t6.*, count(t8.blogid) viewNums from ( select t1.id id, t1.blogid blogId, t2.loginid userId, t2.name userName, t3.columnid columnId, t3.name columnName, t1.title title, case when t1.type="0" then "原创" when t1.type="1" then "转载" end as type, t1.content content, t4.url cover, date_format(t1.createtime, '%Y年%m月%d日') createTime, count(t5.blogid) collectionNums from blog t1 left join blog_user t2 on t1.userid= t2.id left join yeblog_db.column t3 on t1.columnid= t3.id left join sys_file t4 on t1.cover= t4.id left join user_collection t5 on t1.id= t5.blogid where t1.type <> "2" and t1.enable= "1" group by t1.id) t6 left join( select t7.* from blog_view t7 group by t7.ip, day(t7.time) ) t8 on t6.id= t8.blogid group by t6.blogId ) t9 left join blog_comment t10 on t9.id= t10.blogid left join comment_reply t11 on t10.id= t11.commentid group by t9.id order by t9.createtime desc
